wpt.name: GC1EHC5
wpt.desc: Moms are the Best, TB Exchange by deb3day, Traditional Cache (2/1.5)
wpt.urlname: Moms are the Best, TB Exchange

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Moms are the Best, TB Exchange
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: 4qt Lock N Lock hidden on the property of one of my favorite businesses in Thorndale.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
IF YOU DO NOT INTEND ON LOGGING OR MOVING THE TRACKABLES, PLEASE DO NOT TAKE THEM!!!!! Please remember that trackables are other people's possessions. If you keep them, you are STEALING them! If you are new to caching, please read up on how to properly log trackables. Please visit http://www.geocaching.com/track/howto.aspx. As an owner of trackables, it is extremely frustrating to see them handled improperly. Proper logging is essential to know where your trackable is. If you have questions, I will gladly answer them. Email me!

There are no TB Hotels close by, so I thought it was time to create one. I have been thinking about placing a cache outside of a business. Since this business is a personal favorite of mine and the owner knows me from visiting so often, I decided this was the place. I not only like what is sold here, but I love checking out the beautiful gardens both outside and inside. Please take some time to admire all of the beautiful plants. And check out what’s inside, because it is truly the best!

This cache has been hidden with the permission of the business owner. Please respect his property and do NOT disturb any of the beautiful gardens. The cache is NOT hidden anywhere near his lovely plants.

GPS units show the closest road as a small road off of Business Rte 30. This is now a private road, so do not use it. Access should be from Business Rte 30. Because this is near a business, I would not recommend doing this after dark. Police may be suspicious of someone parking near a business at night poking around with a flashlight.

The original contents of this are several TB’s and Geocoins that I collected specifically to get this cache started. Dropping off TB’s that need to move on is encouraged. I will try to keep this stocked with TB's and Geocoins so check back and use the cache to help some of your travelers along.

I thank the business owner for allowing me to place my first cache and for letting all of the geocachers enjoy his gardens.

Please, no swag. I prefer that the TB's be easy to see, and leave room for more.

Please be careful with the camo and replace it as found.

Congratulations to bpp_picnic for FTF!
